short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily create, manage, and deploy squads of Outkasts on missions with a single click. Save time and optimize your gameplay.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of manually selecting and sending each Outkast on a mission? The Outkast Squad Manager is here to simplify your gameplay. Create preset squads of up to 4 Outkasts and deploy them on missions with just one click!

Features:
🛠 Squad Creation: Easily create and customize squads of up to 4 Outkasts.
🚀 One-Click Deployment: Deploy your entire squad on a mission with just a single click.
💾 Local Storage: Your squad presets are saved locally for quick and easy access.
📤 JSON Import/Export: Conveniently export and import squad configurations using JSON.

📘 How It Works:
1️⃣ Create a squad and add up to 4 Outkasts.
2️⃣ Save your squad.
3️⃣ When ready to deploy, just click on the squad and hit "Deploy".

📞 Community Support:
🙋‍♀️ Got questions or feedback? Message @jeangg on Discord!
